body: Basically girl's uncle has a mental disability so they let him stay in their house. Uncle sleeps in the same room as girl's parents at night and oftentimes see them have sex. That's why somehow he's horny despite his condition. Not sure if that's actually how it works in real life but that's pretty much the story. Weird one.
Man, the storyboard is so fucking confusing, I can't understand shit of what is happening
